entry.name: rules
entry.desc: Compile the contents of the matched element as a reusable compiled template.

longdesc.p: Note: For information about how to render templates, see .tmpl() and jQuery.tmpl().

argument.name: add
argument.desc: A string indicating to add a set of rules.

argument.name: rules
argument.desc: The rules to add. Accepts the same format as the rules-option of the validate-method

argument.name: remove
argument.desc: A string indicating to remove rules.

argument.name: rules
argument.desc: The space-separated names of rules to remove and return. If left unspecified, removes and returns all rules. Manipulates only rules specified by the rules option of the .validate() or .rules("add") method.
